description: Complete a combat with at least 1 hostile $creatureType monster
Roll the same number on each d20 during adv or disadv
Break either the single-target or AoE dmg record
Be rewarded during a positive random encounter
Score 2 KBs in the same combat
Deal 100+ dmg or heal 50+ HP (to yourself or others) in a single turn
Empty yourself of spell slots or exertion
Unlock a new ally bonus on an amulet
Complete a combat on 2+ death save failures
Have a total of 30+ temporary hit points granted by you in the party at once
